title: Licensing
context: PART VI. PEDDLERS Note Section 445-141 designated as Part VI by L 1990, c 164, §28. §445-141 Licensing. Each council shall have the power to enact ordinances providing for the licensing and regulation of any person who peddles merchandise. [L 1907, c 96, pt of §1; am L 1917, c 122, §1; am L 1923, c 111, §1; RL 1925, §2077; RL 1935, §2498; am L 1935, c 182, §1; am L 1939, c 109, §1; RL 1945, §7102; am L 1953, c 230, §1; am L 1955, c 193, §1; RL 1955, §155-82; HRS §445-141; am L 1978, c 182, §2; am L 1990, c 164, §22] Case Notes License a tax, when. 36 H. 661 (1944).
